text: Kingdom Records is a British record label from the 1970s and 1980s that was important in early British and Jamaican dub music. == History == One of Kingdom Records' first releases was the 1972 Mojo Hannah single "Six Days on the Road". == Artists == The following artists have all had recordings on Kingdom Records: * Barrington Levy * B.B. King * Caravan * Culture * Gregory Isaacs * Mojo Hannah * Pulsar * Revelation (8) * The Royals * Scientist * Simple Simon * Wayne Gibson# * Judge Dread == References == * Category:British_record_labels
title: Kingdom Records (UK)
